In 2003 she started selling essential goods in her district. After three years in this business, she noticed it did not bring in enough revenue to enable her to meet her expenses. In 2006 Tilalo began selling grains at her home. Her customers are restauranteurs making their purchases at day's end. During the day, she hawks goods, such as pasta and canned foods. The loan that Tilalo is requesting will enable her to purchase two sacks of corn to do better at meeting customer needs and to earn more profit.

loans.use: to purchase corn

loans.name: Raquel

texts.es:
Doña Raquel es una persona muy trabajadora y responsable vive en  una comunidad al sur de Honduras junto  a su esposo y sus 3 hijos. Su negocio es la venta de ropa usada desde hace 10 años.
Doña Raquel vende de manera ambulante en los barrios  cercanos a su comunidad. Necesita el  préstamo para la compra de más producto como ser: camisetas, camisas, buzos, faldas, blusas, pantalones, vestidos, faldas, shorts, etc.
Doña Raquel necesita el préstamo para cubrir la demanda de sus clientes, espera que el préstamo la ayude mucho para cubrir los pedidos que le hacen sus clientes a diario y de igual manera que sus ventas tengan un aumento con el cual pueda mejorar la calidad de vida de la familia.
Doña Raquel espera que sus negocio siga creciendo y de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia y que sus hijos puedan terminara sus estudios y así tener mayores oportunidades en el futuro.



Choluteca, Honduras –Enero 2014
texts.en:
Raquel is a very hardworking and responsible woman who lives with her husband and 3 children in a community on the south of Honduras. She has been engaging in selling used clothes for 10 years.
Raquel is a street vendor, and she sells her products in the neighborhoods located around her community. She is requesting a loan to buy more products such as T-shirts, shirts, tracksuits, skirts, blouses, trousers, dresses and shorts.
Raquel needs a loan to meet her customers’ requests, and she hopes the loan will significantly help her in getting all the daily requests from her customers ready; she also hopes that her sales will increase so that she will be able to improve her family’s standard of living.
Raquel hopes that her activity will keep ion growing, in order to keep on supporting her family through this mean; she also hopes that her children will be able to complete their studies in order to have better chances in the future.


Choluteca, Honduras – January 2014

loans.use: To buy T-shirts, shirts, tracksuits, skirts, blouses, trousers, dresses and shorts.

loans.name: Solly

texts.en:
Solly is 43 years old, is married, and lives at Balolang, Larena, Siquijor, Philippines. In order to earn a living she takes in and raises pigs.

Through Paglaum MPC she obtained the capital to purchase her original piglets and feed. Now, she requests a loan of 10,000 PHP to buy additional feed. She really hopes and prays that her business will grow and benefit her family, in addition to her husband's income. Someday, she wants to build a concrete pig cage to easily keep more sanitary conditions.

loans.use: to purchase additional feed for her piglet-raising business.

loans.name: Guadalupe De Jesus

texts.es:
Guadalupe, ha mejorado mucho las condiciones de su negocio gracias a la ayuda le los créditos que se le otorgan, con el préstamo anterior tuvo los recursos necesarios para mejorar la calidad de ingredientes para preparar la comida y continuar vendiendo para mejorar su situación económica y familiar.
En esta oportunidad opta por más capital para comprar gas propano, maíz, verduras, carnes, aceite, etc., lo que le permitirá continuar atendiendo de una mejor manera a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Guadalupe has improved the conditions of her business a lot, thanks to the help of the loans she has been granted.  With the previous loan she had the resources she needed to improve the quality of the ingredients for making her dishes  and to keep on selling so she could improve her financial and family situations.

Currently Guadalupe's requesting more capital to buy propane gas, corn, vegetables, meat, oil, etc., so she can keep on giving her customers better service.

loans.use: to buy propane gas, corn, vegetables, meat, oil, etc.

loans.name: Alma

texts.en:
Alma is forty-seven years old, married with two kids and a resident of Tuyabang Bajo, Oroquieta City, Philippines. She earns a living through farming. Cultivating plants and vegetables sustain her family but because she lives in the highlands, she needs to go to the city market to sell her harvest.

She has been a member of PMPC for three years and enjoys the privileges that come with being a member of the Cooperative. Now, she is applying for a loan of PHP 14,900 to buy fertilizers for farming and purchase materials to repair her house.

Alma deeply wishes to remain a member in good standing with PMPC.

loans.use: To buy fertilizers for farming and purchase materials for repairing her house

loans.name: Nedelina

texts.en:
Nedelina is 50 years old and married, with three children who are school-aged. She is a resident of Cangmohao, Siquijor, Siquijor. She earns a living through direct selling of ladies’ wear, such as dresses, shoes, bags and other accessories. 

She has been a member of PMPC for one year and enjoys the privileges of being a member of the Cooperative. Now, she is applying for a loan of PHP 6,000 to purchase additional dresses, bags, shoes and accessories.

Nedelina deeply wishes to maintain her status as a member in good standing of PMPC.

loans.use: to purchase dresses, bags, shoes and accessories.

loans.name: Uldona

texts.ru: Улдона живет на районе Шахритус. Ей 46 лет. Она замужем. Улдона начинающая бизнес woman в сфере животноводческой деятельности. Улдона решила купить телят на сумму кредита и начать новую деятельность и найти свой источник дохода. У нее есть немного опыта в этой сфере деятельности. У нее имеется 3 скота для семейных нужд. На сегодняшний день ее скоты находятся в доме, в коровнике брата, потому что Уландон строит новый коровник для скотин. Скоро строительства закончиться и коровы с быками будут располагаться в просторном коровнике. Но то количество скотов, которое у нее имеется не достаточно, чтобы начать бизнес. По этой причине она обратилась за кредитом. Поддержите ее.
texts.en: Uldona lives in Shahrituz. She is 46 years old. She is married. Uldona is a novice business woman working in livestock. Uldona decided to buy calves with the loan and start a new business to get a new source of income. She has a bit of experience in this field. She has three head of cattle for the family's personal use. Currently, her cattle are in her brother's barn because Uldona is building a new barn for the cattle. Soon the construction will be complete, and the bulls and cows will live in a spacious barn. But she does not have enough cattle to start a business. Therefore, she applied for a loan. Support her.

loans.use: buy calves to start a new livestock business.

loans.name: Jocelyn

texts.en:
Jocelyn is 31 years old, married and a resident of Oroquieta City, Philippines. She has a rice retailing business, and she has ventured into a sari-sari (variety) store business in her town to have an extra income for financial purposes. 

She has been a member of PMPC for four years and enjoys the privileges being a member of the Cooperative. Now, she is applying for a loan of 8,000 PHP (Philippines pesos) to purchase sari-sari store stock for her business.

Jocelyn deeply wishes to maintain as a member in good standing with PMPC.

loans.use: to purchase sari-sari (variety) store stock for her business

loans.name: Arlene

texts.en:
Arlene is married with 4 children. She is 33 years old and lives in Sta. Maria, Tangub City, Misamis Occidental.

She sells fried bananas to earn a living and has had this business for 3 years. She has requested a 14,000 PHP loan to purchase additional goods for her business.

Arlene has been a member of PMPC for 3 years. In the future, Arlene hopes to expand her business and plans to own a sari sari store.

loans.use: to purchase additional goods for her food selling business.

loans.name: Rohatoi

texts.ru:
Рохатой проживает в селе Спитаменского района. Ей 47 лет. Она мать четверых детей. Рохатой добрая,трудолюбивая женщина. Ко всему относиться с пониманием. Рохатой по образованию педагог. Она преподаёт в средней школе села. Рохатой очень любит детей и с удовольствием разделяет свои знание с ними. Кроме школы Рохатой еще дома занимается откормом и купля продажей мелко рогатого скота. Ей в этом помогают сыновья и муж. Муж Рохатоя работает председателем дехканского хозяйства. 

Рохатой с мужем решили отремонтировать дом, обновить полы и потолки. Так как в зимний период падают цены на строй материалы, Рохатой хотела бы прикупить их, а к весне начать ремонт. Но Рохатою не хватает немного денег и она обратилась в МДО "Арванд" за кредитом. Рохатой надеется на поддержку организации и в дальнейшем хотела бы сотрудничать с МДО "Арванд".
texts.en:
Rohatoi lives in the village of Spitamen. She is 47 years old. She is the mother of four children. Rohatoi is a kind, hardworking woman. She treats everyone with understanding. Rohatoi's education is in teaching. She teaches high school in the village. Rohatoi loves children and gladly shares her knowledge with them. Besides working at school, Rohatoi also works at home fattening and selling cattle. Her sons and husband help. Rohatoi's husband is a supervisor on a collective farm.  

Rohatoi and her husband have decided to renovate their house, to upgrade the floors and ceilings. Since the cost of building materials falls in winter, Rohatoi would like to buy them now to begin work in spring. Rohatoi is a bit short of money, so she went to MDO Arvand for a loan. Rohatoi hopes that she'll receive this support, and she would like to work with MDO Arvand again in the future.

loans.use: buy building materials

loans.name: Gbenonkpo 2 Group

texts.fr: Le groupe GBENONKPO 2 est constitué de trois personnes qui résident dans le même quartier. La représentante du groupe du nom de Pauline (celle qui a  la main est levée sur la photo) âgée de 39 ans est mariée à un certain  Saliou. Le couple a cinq enfants, tous scolarisés et à leur charge. Pauline vit avec son mari et ses enfants. Les différentes charges de la maison sont assumées le couple. Pour ce faire, Pauline vend de l'igname et du pain depuis une vingtaine d’années à son domicile. Pauline s’approvisionne dans une boulangerie dans sa région. Dans le but de renforcer leur activité, Pauline et les membres du groupe GBENONKPO 2 sollicitent l’appui financier de ALIDé.
texts.en: The group "GBENONKPO 2" is composed of three persons who reside in the same district. The group's representative is Pauline (with her hand raised in the photo). She is 39 years old and married to a man named Saliou. The couple have five children, all in school and in their care. Pauline lives with her husband and children. The different household expenses are covered by the couple. To do so, Pauline has been selling yams and bread for about 20 years out of her home. She gets her supplies from a baker in the region. With the goal of bolstering their businesses, Pauline and the group members of "GBENONKPO 2" are requesting financial support from ALIDé.

loans.use: to purchase yams and bread

loans.name: Francisca Fatima

texts.en:
Francisca is from Cangmohao, Siquijor.  She is 40 years old and married with four children who are school age. 

In 2013, Francisca applied for membership with PMPC.  Hearing about all the benefits, she never hesitated to become a member. She maintains the status of being a member in good standing and repays her obligations in a timely manner.

Recently, Francisca asked for financial assistance of PHP 14,900 to purchase additional ingredients such as flour, sugar and butter. Through this, she hopes to increase her more income and expand her business.  She has found assistance for their financial needs through Paglaum Multi Purpose Cooperative and she is very thankful with all her heart.

loans.use: To purchase additional ingredients such as flour, sugar and butter.

loans.name: Hesila

texts.en:
Hesila is married with 3 children. She is 39 years old and lives in Ubay, Labason, Zamboanga del Norte.

Hesila owned a sari-sari store to earn a living and has had this business for 4 years. Each month, she earns 8,000 PHP doing this type of business. She has requested a loan for 14,900 PHP to restock the store with basic commodities.

Hesila has been an old member of PMPC. In the future, she hopes to expand her store.

loans.use: to restock her general store with basic commodities.

loans.name: Ozoda

texts.ru:
Эту милую женщину зовут Озода. Ей 26 лет. Она замужем. Озода с мужем живет на районе Шахристон городка Истаравшана. Озода очень стеснительная. Она не смогла смотреть на камеру во время съемки в присутствии мужа. В некоторых местах Таджикистана жители из-за религиозных убеждениях не разрешают своим женам, дочерям фотографироваться.
   Озода около 6 лет занимается животноводством. Она выращивает скотин в коровнике. Озода любит животных и ей нравиться проводить время на скотном дворе. На сегодняшний день у нее не много скотов и она решила купить еще несколько телят, чтобы расширить поголовья скота. Но для приобретения телят у нее нет достаточной суммы денег и она решила обратиться за кредитом. Озода верит, что мир не без добрых людей и ей помогут.
texts.en:
This endearing young lady's name is Ozoda.  She's 26, married and lives with her husband in the Shahriston region of Tajikistan.  Ozoda is very shy, and couldn't bring herself to look at the camera for very long when they took her picture with her husband nearby; in certain parts of Tajikistan, people don't allow their wives or daughters to be photographed due to religious beliefs. 

Ozoda has been raising livestock for 6 years.  She loves animals and spending time on her farm.  She has a number of cattle which she keeps in a cow shed; at the moment, she doesn't have many cattle left and has decided to buy a few calves to augment her herd.  However, she lacks the money to buy them and has decided to seek a loan.  Ozoda believes in the kindness of others and is hopeful that she'll get the help she needs.

loans.use: buy cattle

loans.name: Jesugnon Group

texts.fr: Le groupe JESUGNON est constitué de trois personnes qui résident dans le même quartier. La représentante du groupe du nom de Marcelline (celle qui a la main est levée sur la photo) âgée de 41 ans, n’a pas fréquenté l’école. Marcelline est mariée à un menuisier du nom de Martin. Le couple a trois enfants, tous scolarisés et à leur charge. Marcelline vit avec son mari et ses enfants. Les différentes charges de la maison sont assumées le couple. Pour ce faire, Marcelline vend des céréales depuis cinq ans à son domicile. De façon secondaire,  Marcelline vend aussi des condiments. Marcelline s’approvisionne dans un marché du Bénin. Dans le but de renforcer le niveau de leur activité, Marcelline et les membres du groupe JESUGNON l’appui financier de ALIDé.
texts.en: The Jesugnon group is composed of three people living in the same neighborhood. The group's representative, by the name of Marcelline (the one raising her hand in the photo) is 41 years old. She did not attend school. Marcelline is married to Martin, a  woodworker. THey have three dependent children, all in school. Marcelline lives with her husband and children. Teh spouses jointly provide for household needs. In order to so, Marcelline has been selling cereals out of her home for five years.  In addition, she also sells condiments. Marcelline stocks up at a market in Benin. With the goal of expanding their business, Marcelline and the  other members of the Jesugnon group [have applied for] financial support from ALIDé.

loans.use: to buy cereals and condiments.

loans.name: Cerelina

texts.en:
Cerelina is 29 years old and lives in Brgy, Tituron, Tangub City. She is married to a private employee, with four children. 

Cerelina is a fourth-year student of Gov. Alfonso D. Tan College of Tangub City, Misamis Occidental. She requested a loan to pay for her tuition fee. 

Cerelina has been a member of Paglaum Multi-Purpose Cooperative (PMPC) for five years. In the future, Cerelina wants to be a teacher and she wants to improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to pay for her tuition fee.

loans.name: Nyamwepwa

texts.fr: Le client Wangakyumo est travailleur dans un établissement universitaire. Parent d’1 étudiant et d’1élève inscrits régulièrement à l’université et à l'école secondaire. Il a été informé de nouvelles opportunités de crédit éducation qu’offre l’IMF Hekima. Ainsi, ce nouveau prêt lui servira de payer les frais de scolarité de ses enfants pour qu’ils ne soient plus exclus des cours durant toute l’année académique 2013-2014. Le souhait de ce parent est de voir ses enfants achevés leurs études. Il loue grandement l’initiative de Hekima.
texts.en: This client, Wangakyumo, is a worker in a university establishment. A parent of a student and a pupil enrolled regularly at a university and at a school, he was informed of new opportunities for education loans offered by the microfinance institution Hekima. This new loan will thus be used to cover his children's education expenses, so that they are not excluded from classes during the entire 2013-14 academic year. The wish of this parent is to see his children complete their studies. He greatly praises Hekima's initiative.

loans.use: to cover education expenses

loans.name: Hodalo

texts.fr:
Dévouée pour prendre son destin en main, Hodalo est une jeune fille célibataire âgée de 28 ans. Elle fait le commerce des pates alimentaires et du céréale. Elle parcourt plus de 10 kilomètres par jour pour mener son activité. Actuellement elle n'a plus de stock de maïs et vend seulement des pâtes alimentaires et des tomates en boîte. Ce crédit qu'elle sollicite lui permettra de faire l'approvisionnement de 2 sacs de maïs afin d'éviter les ruptures de stock répétées.
Les revenus de son activité lui permettront supporter les charges locatives de sa maison et de se prendre en charge quotidiennement.
texts.en: Determined to take charge of her own destiny, Hodalo is a young single 28 year old woman. She sells food products, notably pasta and cereals. She travels more than 10 kilometers a day in order to continue this activity. She currently does not have any more stock of maize and therefore sells only pasta and canned tomatoes. She is asking for a loan in order to purchase two bags of maize in order to avoid repeated stock ruptures. Sales from her activities allow her to cover her rent costs and daily living expenses.

loans.use: purchase two bags of maize

loans.name: Ayidego Group

texts.fr: Le groupe AYIDEGO est constitué de trois personnes qui résident dans le même quartier. La représentante du groupe du nom de Marguerite Dovomè (celle qui a la main est levée sur la photo) âgée de 48 ans n'a pas fréquentée l'école. Marguerite Dovomè est mariée à un cuisinier nommé Dieudonné. Le couple a cinq enfants, tous scolarisés et à leur charge. Marguerite Dovomè vit avec son mari et ses enfants. Les différentes charges de la maison sont assumées le couple. Pour cela, Marguerite Dovomè vend divers produits: la farine de manioc communément appelé gari, des biscuits et des bonbons depuis une vingtaine d’années à son domicile. Marguerite Dovomè s’approvisionne dans un  marché du Bénin. C’est la première fois, Marguerite Dovomè et les membres du groupe AYIDEGO sollicitent l’appui financier de ALIDé, dans le but de renforcer leur activité afin de mieux faire face à la demande de leur clientèle.
texts.en: The group AYIDEGO is composed of three persons who reside in the same district. The group's representative is Marguerite Dovomè (with her hand raised in the photo). She is 48 years old and did not attend school. She is married to a cook named Dieudonné. The couple have five children, all in school and in their care. Marguerite Dovomè lives with her husband and children. The different household expenses are covered by the couple. To do so, Marguerite Dovomè has been selling a variety of goods: cassava flour (called 'gari'), cookies, and candies for about 20 years out of her home. She gets her supplies from a market in Benin. This is the first time Marguerite Dovomè and the members of the group AYIDEGO have requested financial support from ALIDé with the goal of bolstering their business and doing better at coping with the demands of their customers.

loans.use: to purchase a variety of goods (gari, cookies, and candies) to sell

loans.name: Zebiniso

texts.ru: Она Зебинисо. Ей 54 года. Она замужем за преподавателя. Зебинисо вместе с мужем вырастила четверых детей. У них два сына и две дочки. Старший сын работает в больнице врачом, а другой сын студент. Дочери учатся в школе. Зебинисо с семьей живет на районе Вахш. Там же она осуществляет свою деятельность. Зебинисо более 5 лет работает в сфере торговли. Она продает канцелярские товары и сладкие продукты для детей. Зебинисо нравиться ее работа. Она каждый день общается с новыми людьми и это доставляет ей удовольствие. Зебинисо решила расширить деятельность, увеличить различность товара и пополнить ассортимент товара новыми продукциями. Но для реализации  планов ей необходимы средства. По этой причин она обратилась за кредитом.
texts.en: Zebiniso is 54 years old. She is married to a school teacher. Zebiniso and her husband have raised four children: two sons and two daughters. The eldest son works in a hospital as a medical doctor, and the other son is in college. The daughters are still in secondary school. Zebiniso and her family live in the Vakhsh region. Zebiniso works locally, too. She has been a vendor for over five years. She sells office supplies and sweets for children. Zebiniso likes her work. She gets to talk to new people every day, and  enjoys it. Zebiniso has decided to expand her business, diversify her products and replenish her stock. However, she needs funds to realize her plans. This is why she is applying for a loan.

loans.use: to expand her merchandise offerings.

loans.name: Chen

texts.en:
Chen is a married 32-year-old woman and loving mother of a child who lives with her and her spouse in a remote area of Prey Chhor district, Kampong Cham province. 

Chen has farmed for almost 17 years and also makes mortar from granite to earn additional income for her family. Her income is usually spent on food expenses, home bills, and other commodities.

Due to insufficient capital to invest in her business, she would like 500 US dollars to buy raw materials for her mortar production. She hopes the loan will be granted to allow her to continue working with her business and stabilize her household income.

loans.use: to buy raw materials for to produce mortar.

loans.name: Mwilehwa

texts.fr: Madame Mwilehwa est travailleuse dans un établissement universitaire. Cette cliente est parent d’un étudiant et d’un élève à l’école secondaire. Le prêt sollicité  lui servira de payer les frais scolaires et académiques pour ses enfants enfin qu’ils ne soient plus exclus des cours durant toute l’année scolaire 2013-2014. Ce parent souhaite voir ses enfants achevés leurs études et devenir de grands professeurs d’université. Elle remercie l’IMF Hekima pour son nouveau produit consacré à l’éducation de leurs enfants.
texts.en: Ms. Mwilehwa is a worker in a university establishment. This client is a parent of a student and a pupil at a secondary school. The loan requested will be used to cover her children's education expenses, so that they will not be excluded from classes during the entire 2013-14 academic year. This parent would like to see her children complete their studies and become great university professors. She thanks the microfinance institution Hekima for its new product dedicated to education.

loans.use: to cover education expenses

loans.name: Safiyatu

texts.en:
This is 34 year-old Safiyatu. She is divorced and has 2 children, ages 12 and 7 years, both of whom go to school. She has 2 additional dependents who live with her to be fostered and go to school.  

In 2000, Safiyatu established her liquor and provisions business. She began her business when her mother got ill. She dropped out of school when she was still in primary school because of lack of financial support and started peddling at a young age to help in providing for the home. Working 7 days a week and 16 hours a day, she earns about 1,479,000 SLL every month from this business. 

She would like a loan in the amount of 4,000,000 SLL. Safiyatu requires a loan in order to purchase cartons of liquor and provisions. In the future, Safiyatu plans to expand her business. With rapid changes of prices, those items are in great demand. She is a hardworking businesswoman. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to purchase cartons of liquor and provisions to sell.

loans.name: Françoise Rita's Group

texts.fr: Ce groupe est constitué de trois personnes qui résident dans le même quartier. La représentante du groupe nommée Françoise Rita (celle qui a la main est levée sur la photo) âgée de 52 ans, a fréquenté l’école jusqu’au niveau secondaire. Françoise Rita est mariée à un certain Adolphe. Le couple n’a pas d’enfants. Françoise Rita vit ensemble avec son mari. Le couple assure ensemble les différentes charges de la maison. Pour cette raison, Françoise Rita vend depuis quinze ans des boissons à son domicile. Françoise Rita s’approvisionne dans un  marché du Bénin. C’est la deuxième fois que Françoise Rita et les membres de son groupe sollicite l’appui financier de ALIDé, dans le but de rehausser le niveau de leur activité afin de mieux répondre à la demande de sa clientèle. Le prêt antérieur a été bien remboursé.
texts.en: This group is composed of three persons living in the same neighborhood. The representative of the group, named Françoise Rita (seen in the photo with a raised hand) is 52 years old, and attended school up until the secondary level. She is married to a man named Adolphe, and the couple do not have any children. They live together, and share the living expenses. For this reason, Françoise Rita has been selling drinks from her home for the past 15 years. She stocks up at a market in Benin. This is the second loan she and the members of the group are asking from ALIDE, in order to increase their activity level and better respond to client demands. The previous loan was successfully reimbursed.

loans.use: purchase drinks

loans.name: Chasinga Pierre

texts.fr: Le client Chasinga  est employé à un etablissement universitaire. Il  est parent de 2 élèves inscrits  régulièrement à l’école. Il a été informé de nouvelles opportunités de crédit éducation qu’offre l’IMF Hekima pour financer anticipativement les frais de scolarité. Ainsi, ce nouveau prêt lui servira de payer les frais de scolarité pour ses  enfants  pour qu’ils ne soient plus exclus des cours durant toute l’année scolaire 2013-2014. Ainsi,il salut grandement l’initiative spéciale de Hekima.
texts.en: This client, Chasinga, is employed at a university establishment. He is a parent of two pupils enrolled regularly in school. He was informed of new opportunities for education loans offered by the microfinance institution Hekima to finance education expenses in advance. This new loan will thus be used to cover his children's education costs, so that they are not excluded from classes during the entire 2013-14 academic year. He therefore lifts his hat to Hekima's special initiative.

loans.use: to cover education expenses

loans.name: Erma

texts.en:
Erma is from Lower Calatunan, Zamboanga del Norte. She is 44-years-old and married with six kids. 

In this current year, Erma applied for membership with PMPC.  Hearing all the benefits, she never hesitated to become one. She maintains the status of being a member in good standing and repays her obligations in a timely manner.

Recently, Erma has asked for financial assistance of PHP 7,000 to buy additional stock of sugar, rice, oil and soap for her sari-sari store. Through this, she hopes to increase her income and help to expand her business. She has found assistance for their financial needs through Paglaum Multi-Purpose Cooperative and she is very thankful with all her heart.

loans.use: to buy additional stock of sugar, rice, oil and soap her sari-sari (convenience) store

loans.name: Mahougnon 1 Group

texts.fr: Le groupe MAHOUGNON 1 est constitué de trois personnes qui résident dans le même quartier. La représentante du groupe du nom de Colette Honorine(celle qui a la main est levée sur la photo) âgée de 35 ans, n’a pas fréquenté l’école. Colette Honorine est mariée à un jardinier du nom de Barthélémy. Le couple a trois enfants, tous scolarisés et à leur charge. Colette Honorine vit avec son mari et ses enfants. Les différentes charges de la maison sont assumées le couple. Pour ce faire, Colette Honorine vend divers produits(galette, bonbons et de la farine de manioc appelé gari)depuis sept ans à son domicile. Colette Honorine s’approvisionne dans un  marché du Bénin. Dans le but de renforcer le niveau de leur activité, Colette Honorine et les membres du groupe MAHOUGNON 1 sollicitent pour la première fois l’appui financier de ALIDé.
texts.en: The group "MAHOUGNON 1" is composed of three persons who reside in the same district. The group's representative is Colette Honorine (with her hand raised in the photo). She is 35 years old and did not attend school. She is married to a gardener named Barthélémy. The couple have three children, all in school and in their care. Colette Honorine lives with her husband and children. The different household expenses are covered by the couple. To do so, Colette Honorine has been selling a variety of goods: cakes, candies, and cassava flour (called 'gari') for about seven years out of her home. She gets her supplies from a market in Benin. With the goal of bolstering the level of their businesses, Colette Honorine and the members of the group "MAHOUGNON 1" are requesting for the first time financial support from ALIDé.

loans.use: to purchase a variety of products, such as 'gari' and candies to sell

loans.name: Akouavi Gertrude's Group

texts.fr: Ce groupe est composé de sept personnes qui résident dans le même quartier. C'est la quatrième fois que ce groupe sollicite l’appui financier de ALIDé, afin d'élever le niveau de son activité. La représentante du groupe, du nom de Akouavi Gertrude(celle qui a la main levée sur la photo)âgée de 61 ans, a fréquenté l’école jusqu’au niveau primaire. Akouavi Gertrude est veuve avec trois enfants, tous scolarisés et à sa charge.  Akouavi Gertrude vit seule avec ses enfants. Les diverses charges de la maison sont supportées par elle.  C’est pour cette raison que dame Akouavi Gertrude vend des produits vivriers dans sa région depuis trente cinq ans, ce qui lui permet de répondre sans difficulté aux besoins de ses enfants. Akouavi Gertrude s'approvisionne dans un marché du Bénin. Dans le but de renforcer le niveau de son activité et de satisfaire sa clientèle, Akouavi Gertrude ensemble avec les autres membres de son groupe sollicite un quatrième crédit auprès de ALIDé. Les prêts antérieurs ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en:
This group is composed of seven persons who reside in the same district. This is the fourth time this group has requested financial support from ALIDé to boost their businesses. The group's representative, Akouavi Gertrude (with her hand raised in the photo), is 61 years old and has a primary school education. She is a widow and has three children, all in school and in her care. She lives alone with her children. The diverse household expenses are covered by her. This is why she Ms. Akouavi Gertrude has been selling staple foods in her region for 35 years. It enables her to respond to her children's needs without much difficulty. She gets her supplies from a market in Benin. 

With the goal of boosting her business and satisfying her customers, Akouavi Gertrude and the other members of the group are requesting a fourth loan from ALIDé. The previous loans were indeed paid back.

loans.use: to purchase staple foods and beverages to sell

loans.name: Vilma

texts.es:
Vilma vive en la ciudad de Cusco al sur de Perú y pertenece al banco comunal “Imasumac II” de la Asociación Arariwa. Ella es una madre trabajadora que saca adelante a su familia con el esfuerzo de su trabajo. Su actividad económica principal es la venta de artesanía como por ejemplo chompas, chalinas, guantes, gorros y otras cosas más. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar chompas de lana de alpaca para esta temporada de invierno.  

Se siente agradecida por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en: Vilma lives in the city of Cusco in southern Peru, and belongs to the Arariwa Association's "Imasumac II" communal bank. She is a hardworking mother who advances her family by the effort of her work. Her main living comes from the sale of artisanal clothing, such as sweaters, scarves, gloves, and beanies, among other items. At the moment, she needs this loan to buy alpaca wool sweaters for the winter season. She is thankful for the loan and is committed to making her payments as promised.

loans.use: to buy alpaca wool sweaters for the winter season.

loans.name: Ballo Group

texts.fr: le groupe BALLO est constitué de trois personnes qui résident dans le même quartier. C’est la deuxième fois que ce groupe sollicite, l’appui financier de ALIDé. La représentante du groupe nommée Bernadette (celle qui a  la main est levée sur la photo) âgée de 47 ans, a fréquenté l’école jusqu’au niveau secondaire. Bernadette  est mariée à un certain Valentin. Le couple a quatre enfants, tous scolarisés et deux à leur charge. Bernadette vit ensemble avec son mari et ses enfants. Le couple assure ensemble les différentes charges de la maison. C’est pour cette raison que, depuis une trentaine d’années, Bernadette vend à son domicile du maïs et du haricot, ce qui lui permet de répondre sans difficulté aux besoins de sa famille. Bernadette s’approvisionne dans un marché du Bénin. Ce crédit servira à Bernadette et aux membres du groupe BALLO d’augmenter leur fond de roulement afin de renforcer le niveau de leur activité. Ce groupe est à son deuxième crédit, le prêt antérieur a été bien remboursé.
texts.en: The group BALLO is composed of seven persons who reside in the same district. This is the second time this group has requested financial support from ALIDé to boost their businesses. The group's representative, Bernadette (with her hand raised in the photo), is 47 years old and has a secondary school education. She is married to a man named Valentin. The couple have four children, all in school and in their care. Bernadette lives with her husband and children. The couple jointly ensure that the different household expenses are covered. For this reason, Bernadette has been selling corn and beans out of her home for about thirty years. This enables her to respond to her family's needs without much difficulty. She gets her supplies from a market in Benin. This loan will be used by Bernadette and the other members of the group BALLO to boost their businesses. This group is on its second loan. The previous one was indeed paid back.

loans.use: to purchase corn and beans

loans.name: Ishara Group

texts.fr: Madame Cheusi, femme ambitieuse et  courage de l’association d’affaire Ishara;  est  commerçante ambulante depuis plus de 10ans.  Agée de 61 ans, elle est mère de 4enfants  qui vont tous à l’école et est engagée à un homme sans emploi. Elle sollicite ce nouveau prêt pour acheter 3sacs de farine, 50kgs de sucre, 1sac de braise et 10litres d’huile végétale.  Le plus grand obstacle qu’elle rencontre pendant la saison sèche c’est la mévente mais qu’à cela ne tiennent  elle veut devenir une grande commerçante. Elle remercie Hekima pour tout.
texts.en:
Mrs. Cheusi is a brave and ambitious woman who belongs to the Ishara business group. She has been an itinerant vendor for over 10 years. At age 61, she is a mother to four children who all attend school, and she is engaged to a man who is currently unemployed. 

She is seeking a new loan to purchase 3 sacks of flour, 50 kg of sugar, one sack of charcoal and 10 liters of vegetable oil. Drops in sales are the main obstacle that she faces during the dry season, but she is not deterred; she plans to become a leading merchant. 

Mrs. Cheusi is thankful to Hekima for all their support.

loans.use: to purchase 3 sacks of flour, 50 kg of sugar, one sack of charcoal and 10 liters of vegetable oil.

loans.name: Tursunoy

texts.ru: Турсуной жительница одного из гостеприимных районов Республики Таджикистана района Спитамен. Ей 59 лет. Она замужем. Турсуной собирается начать новую деятельность. Она хочет выращивать скотов у себя дома в коровнике. Для начала данного бизнеса требуется немало средств. Она просит кредит на сумму $2000, чтобы купить скотов и начать бизнес. Турсуной насчитанная женщина она верит, что ее деятельность получит успех, ведь климат и природа Спитаменского района вполне способствует здоровому росту животных. Турсуной надеется, что ее поддержат в обоснование нового бизнеса и осуществление источника дохода.
texts.en: Tursunoy lives in Spitamen, one of the hospitable regions of the Republic of Tajikistan. She is 59 years old and married. She is planning on beginning a new business. She wants to raise livestock using the barn on her property. Starting the business demands a fair amount of capital. She is asking for a $2000 loan to buy animals and begin the business. Tursunoy is a responsible woman and she believes that she will achieve success in her work; after all, the climate and environment of the Spitamen region are very conducive to livestock's healthy growth. Tursunoy hopes that she will be supported in founding a new business and producing a source of income.

loans.use: To buy calves and begin a new animal husbandry business

loans.name: Saybegim

texts.ru:
Сайбегим живет и трудится в своем районе Хамадони. Она замужняя женщина, ей 48 лет. Сайбегим имеет одну дочь и троих сыновей. Ее муж работает на стройке в столице, двое старших сыновей находятся на заработках в России. 
Сама Сайбегим фермер. Она на своем маленьком участке земли занимается растениеводством и выращивает в основном огородные культуры. В данный момент, чтобы улучшить жизненные условия семьи она собирается параллельно начать бизнес в сфере животноводства. Сайбегим не хватает собственных средств и в связи с этим она обратилась за кредитом, чтобы приобрести крупнорогатый скот. С кормом у нее проблем не будет, так как у них в районе имеются пастбища, а также она может брать люцерну и другую траву со своего участка земли.
texts.en: Saybegim lives and works in Hamadoni. She is a married woman, 48 years old. Saybegim has one daughter and three sons. Her husband works in construction in the capital. Her the two eldest sons are working in Russia. Saybegim is a farmer. She has a small plot of land where she grows mainly vegetables. Currently, to improve her family's living conditions, she wants to start an animal husbandry business. Saybegim does not have the funds and therefore she applied for a loan to buy cattle. She has no problems getting feed since there is pasture in the area. Cattle can eat alfalfa and grass from her land.

loans.use: buy cattle to start a business

loans.name: Lilian

texts.es:
Lilian, opta por otro crédito para surtir el inventario de su negocio con el que comprara zapatos, sandalias, chancletas, bolsos, granos básicos y lácteos,  su negocio está creciendo cada vez más y sus ingresos son mejores.
Para Lilian el préstamo anterior le ayudo a cubrir las demandas de sus clientes, ofrecer mejores productos y buenos precios, cancelo satisfactoriamente sus cuotas da mayor apoyo a sus hijos en su educación.
texts.en: Lilian is taking out another loan to bolster the inventory of her store, buying shoes, sandals, flip-flops, bags, staple grains, and milk. Her business is growing at a fast pace and her sales are going up. For Lilian the last loan helped to meet her customers' needs and offer better merchandise at better prices. She successfully met her payments and was able to better support her children in their education.

loans.use: to buy shoes, sandals, flip-flops, bags, staple grains, and milk

loans.name: Fatimata

texts.fr:
Mme Fatimata  est âgée de 53 ans, mariée, mère de 7 enfants, elle vit dans une famille polygame chez son mari dans le quartier Sogomougou Bolibana de la préfecture de Koutiala, région de Sikasso. 
Mme Fatimata  exerce les activités commerciales basées sur l’achat et vente de Draps de lit et des pièces de Pagnes  depuis plus de 10 ans. Cette activité lui procure assez de revenus, sa notoriété est bonne car elle reçoit beaucoup de clients. Pour la bonne satisfaction de sa clientèle et l’agrandissement de son activité, Mme a fait recours à l’institution de micro finance Soro Yiriwaso, elle est à son sixième cycle de prêt. Ce prêt sera utilisé pour l’achat de Draps de lit et des pièces de Pagnes. Elle s’approvisionne à Koutiala et à Sikasso, effectue sa vente au grand marché et à la maison à une clientèle composée de femmes et d’hommes au comptant. Avec l’agrandissement de son activité, Mme compte réaliser un bénéfice mensuel de 50 000 FCFA qu’elle utilisera pour le remboursement des taux d’intérêt de Soro, satisfaire ces  besoins personnels et investir le reste dans son activité.
texts.en:
Mrs. Fatimata, age 53, is the married mother of seven children. She lives with her husband as part of a polygamous family in the district of Sogomougou Bolibana, prefecture of Koutiala, in the region of Sikasso.

For over 10 years, Mrs. Fatimata has been practicing commercial activities revolving around the purchase and sale of bed sheets and pagnes. This allows her to earn substantial income, and she has built a good reputation judging by her client base. 

To better meet customer demand and to expand her business, Mrs. Fatimata turned to the Soro Yiriwaso microfinance institution, and this is her 6th loan cycle. This loan will be used to buy bed sheets and pagnes. She buys her stock in Koutiala and in Sikasso, and she sells at the market and from her home, for cash, to a clientele consisting of both men and women. 

By expanding her activity, she expects to earn a monthly profit of 50,000 FCFA, which she will use to pay the interest on her loan and to provide for her personal needs. Any remainder will be reinvested in her activity.

loans.use: to buy bed sheets and pagnes for resale.

loans.name: Mungunshagai

texts.en:
Mrs. Mungunshagai is married and lives with her husband and two children in the Arkhangai province of Mongolia. They live in a Ger (Mongolian traditional Yurt).  Her older son attends a local primary school. Her younger son attends kindergarten. She began working at a public shower eight years ago and she now rents the place and makes it her own small business. She is a polite and hardworking woman who has a lot of experience in the service business.

Her daily income is around 50,000-150,000 MNT. She has recently bought a new car from her business profit which she lets to her husband to run a taxi service in town to increase their family income.

She is requesting a loan of 1,100,000 MNT to buy firewood and coal to provide a comfortable and warm service to local residents.

loans.use: to buy firewood and coal to provide a comfortable and warm service to local residents

loans.name: Navey

texts.en: Navey is a 32-year-old married woman with two children from Kampong Chhnang Province. She is a watermelon vendor, and her husband is a timber retailer. Both of them can earn $35 per day. Now she would like to apply for loan of $1,500 to buy a pig to breed and sell to make profit. Then she can use the money to buy a motorbike. She hopes that her business can get more expansion and her kids can get a bachelor's degree.

loans.use: to buy a pig to breed and sell to make profit

loans.name: Parvona

texts.ru: Парвона коммуникабельная, усердная и приятная в общении человек. Ей 27 лет. Она родом из района Хамадони. Парвона замужем и является матерью двух дочерей и сына. Ее муж бизнесмен. Он занимается продажей детских одежд на рынке района. Сама Парвона домохозяйка. Она недавно научилась профессии швеи и теперь хочет открыть свое швейное дело. Парвона нуждается в кредите для осуществления цели. Она запрашивает кредит в размере 800 долларов США, чтобы купить швейную машинку. Парвона у себя дома будет принимать заказы на шитье женских национальных платьев. Она уже подготовила отдельную комнату для своей деятельности. Сейчас она ждет только поддержки. Благодаря кредите она откроет свое дело, будет зарабатывать и стане независимой, что очень важно для нее.
texts.en: Parvona is a sociable, hard working, pleasant, and outgoing person. She's 27 years old. She is originally from Hamadoni. Parvona married and has two daughters and a son. Her husband is a businessman. He sells children's clothes in the market. Parvona is a housewife. She recently learned how to be a seamstress and now wants to start her own sewing business. Parvona needs a loan to start the business. She is requesting a loan of $800 to buy a sewing machine. Parvona will take special orders to make traditional dresses from home. She has already prepared a separate room for her work. Now she just needs money. Thanks to this loan, she will open a business and become independent, which is very important to her.

loans.use: buy a sewing machine to start a sewing business

loans.name: Abrahám

texts.es:
Abrahám es un hombre casado de 26 años de edad, vive junto a su hijo de dos años y su esposa en el Departamento de Sololá.
El se dedica a la elaboración de bordados en blusas típicas que son utilizados por las mujeres de su región. Eligió esta actividad porque sus padres se dedicaban al mismo oficio, es así como fue adquiriendo conocimiento en esta labor desde hace ocho años. Esta actividad le ha generado buenos ingresos y ganancias, ya que existe una fuerte demanda en este tipo de negocio que le ayuda a cubrir los gastos de su familia.
El ahora ve que este negocio cada vez incrementa,  por lo que está solicitando un préstamo de Q 5,000.00 para la compra de ropa típica para elaborar más bordados y de esta manera podrá darles un mejor servicio a sus clientes.
Comenta que uno de sus sueños es tener un local en donde pueda exhibir sus productos, ya que por el momento solo lo puede comercializar desde su vivienda.
texts.en: Abrahám, age 26, is a married man who lives with his two year-old son and his wife in Sololá Province. He makes his living doing embroidery on traditional blouses worn by the women of his region. He chose this career because it's what his parents did, which is how he learned the trade over eight years. This business has brought in good income and earned him a profit, due to the strong demand for this service, that has helped him to cover his family's expenses. At the moment he is seeing his business grow quickly, which is why he's taking out this loan of 5,000 Quetzales to buy traditional clothing to embroider. This way, he'll be able to provide a better service to his clientele. He tells us that one of his dreams is to have a place to exhibit his merchandise, as he currently can only operate out of his home.

loans.use: to buy traditional clothing for embroidery.

loans.name: Nasiba

texts.ru: Насиба предприимчивая и деятельная женщина с района Носири Хусрав. Ей 34 года. Она замужем за Рузибоем и у них замечательные дети. Насиба вместе с мужем собирается открыть семейный торговый бизнес. Они на рынке района приобрели торговую точку и планируют заняться продажей мужской одежды. В основном эту деятельностью будет вести муж, а Насиба будет помогать ему. Так как их начального капитала не хватает для приобретения товара, Насиба обратилась за кредитом. На сумму кредита муж Насибы оптом привезет коллекцию сезонной мужской одежды с центрального рынка района Шахритус. Они верят, что их бизнес будет успешным и надеются на финансовую поддержку.
texts.en: Nasiba is an active and enterprising woman from the Nosiri Khusrav district. She is 34 years old. She is married to Ruzibo, and they have wonderful children. Nasiba and her husband are planning on opening a family retail business. They have a stall at the district market, where they intend to sell men's clothing. The husband will be primarily responsible for the work, but Nasiba will help him. Since they don't have enough starting capital to build an inventory, Nasiba is requesting a loan. Using the loan, Nasiba's husband will be able to get collections of seasonal mens clothing wholesale from the central market of the Sharituz district. The believe that their business will be successful, and they hope for financial support.

loans.use: To buy mens clothes to begin a sales business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy parts and upholstery for his motorcycle taxi

loans.name: Lorna

texts.en:
Lorna is married with two children.  She is 47-years-old and lives in Tapican, Liloy, Zamboanga del Norte.

Lorna sells ukay-ukay (used clothing) to earn a living and has had this business for 10 years. Each month, she earns 5,000 PHP doing this type of business. She has requested a loan for 12,000 PHP for additional capital to restock her store with more ukay-ukay (used clothing) to sell.

Lorna  has been a member of PMPC since 2012.  In the future, Lorna  hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: to restock her store with more ukay-ukay (used clothing) to sell

loans.name: Samara

texts.ru: Самаре 22 года, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 2 детей. У Самары - высшее образование, сразу после окончания школы вышла замуж за Асхата и одновременно училась в высшем учебном заведении. После окончания работала учителем в местной школе, на сегодняшний день Самара в декретном отпуске ожидают пополнения в семье, то есть третьего ребенка. Семья образцовая, несмотря на то что молодая. И в качестве дополнительного дохода для своей семьи Самара занимается животноводством и полеводством, стартовав 4 года назад, с покупки скота на 30,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Самары, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 1 дойная корова, 30 овец, также обрабатывают 2,28 ГА земли, где ежегодно сажают фасоль для реализации. Ежемесячный доход составляет 10,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Самара обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом - на покупку коров для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Самара планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить средства на дальнейшее обучение детей.
texts.en: Samara is 22 years old, married, and has two children with her spouse. Samara has a college education. Right after high school she married Ashat, but also studied at a university. After graduation she worked as a teacher in a local school, and she is currently on leave as her family is growing, that is, she is expecting their third child. The family is exemplary, despite her young age. To earn additional income for the family Samara raises animals and farms. She started four years ago with the purchase of 30,000 som (KGS) of livestock. Thanks to her tireless work she now owns a milk cow and 30 sheep, and she also farms 2.28 hectares of land where she plants beans each year to sell. Her monthly income is 10,000 som (KGS). In order to further develop her business Samara came to Bai-Tushum for a loan to buy cows to increase their herd. She plans to invest income from the loan into further expanding her livestock herd, and she also plans to save funds for her children's future education.

loans.use: to buy cows

loans.name: Lorites

texts.en: Lorites is married and has two children. She is 36-years-old and lives in Montol, Ozamiz City, Misamis Occidental.  She is a farmer and her husband has been a pedicab operator for 21 years. Lorites has requested a loan of 50,000 PHP to buy a secondhand pedicab unit for hire. She has been a member of PMPC for two years.  In the future, she hopes to be successful in her business.

loans.use: to buy a secondhand four wheel vehicle

loans.name: Blandine's Group

texts.fr: Ce groupe est constitué de trois personnes qui résident dans le même quartier. La représentante du groupe nommée Blandine (celle qui a la main est levée sur la photo) âgée de 43 ans, a fréquenté l’école jusqu’au niveau secondaire. Blandine est mariée à un frigoriste nommé Sostène. Le couple a trois enfants, tous scolarisés et à leur charge. Blandine vit seule avec ses enfants. Les différentes charges de la maison sont assumées par Blandine et son mari. C’est pour cette raison, Blandine vend depuis dix huit ans du savon liquide par la technique de distribution. Blandine s’approvisionne dans un  marché du Bénin. C’est la première fois que Blandine et les membres de son groupe sollicite l’appui financier de ALIDé, dans le but de renforcer le niveau de leur activité afin de mieux répondre à la demande de leur clientèle.
texts.en: This group is composed of three people living in the same neighborhood. The representative of the group, named Blandine (seen in the photo with her hand raised), is 43 years old, and attended school until the secondary level. She is married to a refrigerator/air conditioner technicien named Sostène. The couple have three children, all of whom attend school. Blandine lives alone with her children. The household expenses are shared by both of them. For this reason, Blandine has been spending the last ten years selling liquid soap. She stocks up on merchandise at the market in Benin. This is the first loan Blandine and the members of the group are asking for a loan from ALIDE, in order to reinforce their sales and better respond to client requests.

loans.use: purchase liquid soap and pasta

loans.name: Carlito

texts.en:
Carlito is a 53-year-old member of Paglaum Multi-Purpose Cooperative from Caticugan, Siquijor, Siquijor, industriously caring for his fishing activities.  He is separated and has three children.  He personally takes charge of their business and their children work for them as support. The business is doing well.  Carlito has humbly taught his children the techniques of how to enjoy a business and at the same time make earnings from it. The ups and downs of the business is nothing but a normal situation for him. Sometimes they have business losses, sometimes a good return. He is a savvy business man. 

Now Carlito sees a good opportunity to expand their business. He is requesting PHP 13,000 from Paglaum Multi-Purpose Cooperative for capital to buy additional nets and fishing accessories. He deeply wishes for a good education for his children and for them to have businesses of their own.

loans.use: To purchase additional fishing equipment such as fish nets and foam.

loans.name: Solidad

texts.en:
Solidad joined Paglaum Multi-Purpose Cooperative in the year 2013 and she appreciates the programs, services and continuous education of the co-op. She is a member in good standing and very active in attending the various programs and services that the Cooperative offers.

She is requesting a loan in the amount of PHP 7,000. This loan is intended to purchase additional ingredients, such as vegetables, and equipment.

Solidad dreams of nothing more than to have a happy, healthy life and an adequate income from her business.

loans.use: To purchase additional ingredients, such as vegetables, and equipment.

loans.name: Ana Yancy

texts.es:
Ana, se decidió por solicitar un crédito nuevo por que necesita comprar un puesto de venta, frutas y verduras, en el que dará un mejor servicio, buena vistosidad de sus productos, tendrá oportunidad de vender más y mejorar la rentabilidad de su negocio, con la cual cancelara sus deudas y contribuirá de gran manera en los gastos de su hogar.
Con el préstamo anterior compro diversidad de calzado para ofrecer otro tipo de productos a sus clientes y mejoro la venta de frutas y verduras.
texts.en:
Ana decided to request another loan because she needs to buy a sales stall, fruits, and vegetables.  She'll give better service and have good product visibility, and she'll be able to sell more and improve her business profitability, pay her debts, and help a lot with her household expenses.

With the previous loan she bought a variety of footwear to sell another type of product to her customers.  She also improved her sales of fruits and vegetables.

loans.use: to buy a sales stall, fruits, and vegetables

loans.name: Kulbubu

texts.ru: Кулбубу 46 лет, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 6 детей. 2 детей работают и проживают в России, 2 дочки замужем, 2 детей дошкольного возраста. У Кулбубу - среднее образование. В качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Кулбубу занимается полеводством и животноводством, стартовав 20 лет назад, с 5,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Кулбубу, на сегодняшний день имеется: 1 дойная корова, 1 лошадь, 10 коз и 15 овец, а также 2,38 ГА земельной доли, на которой ежегодно выращивает фасоль для внутрихозяйственного потребления и реализации. Ежемесячный доход составляет 12,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Кулбубу обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом - на покупку семян фасоли для посевных работ и удобрений для обработки земли. Доходы от кредита Кулбубу планирует вложить в приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить средства на дальнейшее образование 2 детей.
texts.en: Kulbubu is 46 years old, married, and has six children with her spouse. Two of the children work and live in Russia, two daughters are married, and the other two are school-age. Kulbubu has a high school education. She earns the primary source of income for the family by farming and raising livestock, which she started 20 years ago with 5,000 som (KGS). Thanks to her tireless work today she owns a milk cow, a horse, 10 goats and 15 sheep, and also 2.38 hectares of land where she grows beans each year for family use and sale. Her monthly income is 12,000 som (KGS). In order to further develop the business Kulbubu came to Bai-Tushum for a loan to buy bean seed for planting, and fertilizer for preparing the land. Kulbubu plans to invest the income from the loan into further expanding their livestock herd, and also plans to save for the further education of two of the children.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and bean seed

loans.name: Deyanira Epifania

texts.es: Deyanira tiene 23 años de edad. Es originaria de la ciudad de León. Es una joven soltera con muchos deseos de superación. Actualmente, estudia en una de las universidades de la ciudad. Deyanira no cuenta con los recursos suficientes, pero ella y su familia hacen sacrificios para completar sus estudios como profesional, motivo que la ha llevado a esforzarse y se siente satisfecha de lo que ha logrado hasta ahora. Solicita el crédito para pagar sus módulos de finalización de estudios y así lograr obtener su título. Su plan futuro es conseguir un empleo en donde pueda aplicar los conocimientos adquiridos y lograr obtener mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
Deyanira is 23 years old and was born in the city of Leon. She is a young single woman with a great desire to get ahead. At present, she is studying in one of the city's universities. Deyanira can't count on sufficient financial resources, but she and her family are making sacrifices to help her complete her studies and become a professional, the motive that has led her to push herself. She feels satisfaction with what she has achieved up until now.

Deyanira is requesting a loan to cover her finalization fees for her studies in order to obtain her degree. Her future plan is to gain employment wherever she can apply the knowledge she has acquired and succeed in gaining a better income.

loans.use: to pay her final fees and graduate from a university in Leon.

loans.name: Kulkan

texts.ru: Кулкан 64 года, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 4 детей. Все дети женаты, проживают отдельно, только самый младший со своей семьей живет с родителями и помогает по хозяйству. У Кулкан - среднее образование, сразу после окончания школы пошла работать табаководом в колхозе, за это время приобрела солидный опыт в сельском хозяйстве. Выйдя замуж, она вместе с супругом начала совместное хозяйство по разведению скота и полеводства. Супруг долгое время работал водителем в колхозе, после выхода на пенсию стал заниматься садоводством и селекционированием яблок и других видов фруктовых саженцев. Кулкан всегда помогала супругу во всех делах и благодаря упорному труду Кулкан, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 1 дойная корова, 1 теленок, 50 овец, 1 лошадь, также обрабатывают 2,28 ГА земельной доли на которой выращивают фасоль. Ежемесячный доход составляет 11,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Кулкан обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом - на покупку овец для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Кулкан планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины,.
texts.en: Kulkan is 64 years old, married, and has four children with her husband. The children are all married and living separately, except for the youngest who lives with his family with his parents and helps on the property. Kulkan has a high school education. Right after finishing school she began working as a tobacco grower on a collective farm, which gave her considerable experience in agriculture. After marrying, she and her husband began farming and raising livestock together. Her husband worked as a driver for the collective farm, and after retiring began gardening and breeding apples and other fruits. Kulkan always helped her husband with everything, and thanks to her hard work they now own a milk cow, a calf, 50 sheep, and a horse, and grow beans on 2.28 hectares of land. Their monthly income is 11,000 som (KGS). In order to further develop the business Kulkan came to Bai-Tushum for a loan to buy sheep to expand their herd. She plans to invest income from the loan into further increasing their number of livestock.

loans.use: to buy sheep

loans.name: Sokhom

texts.en: Sokhom is 57 years old, a widowed woman with one child in Kampong Chhnang Province. For survival, she runs a small business as a retailer at home, and her daughter works at the garment factory. Both of them can earn $7 per day. Now she would like to apply for loan of $500 to buy more products to expand her business. This loan is helpful for her business as well as her standard of living. Her life can be better through this loan. In addition to running this small business, she also plans to buy a sewing machine to provide additional services to make more profit.

loans.use: to buy more products to expand her business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy ingredients such as rice, oils, potatoes and others.

loans.name: Janicemarry

texts.en: Janicemarry is 27 years old and married; she had to raise two children. Her spouse helps out in the household. She has requested a loan of Php 5,000. As a main source of income for her family, she is raising poultry, having launched this business 1 year ago by buying animals for Php 2,000. Thanks to Janicemarry’s hard work, her farm now includes six chickens and ducks. Her monthly income is Php 2,000. She plans to use the income from her loan for an additional expansion of her business, and also plans to save for building a new house.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her poultry business

loans.name: Cosme

texts.en: Cosme, 54 years of age, is married to a domestic helper in Hong Kong. Being a father to their six children is the hardest task of his life but still he enjoys taking care of them. Cosme runs a transportation business, specifically motorcycle transport. He's been in this business for almost three years and earns a net income of PHP 200 a day. Due to a lack of capital, he would like a loan of PHP 10,000 to pay for the repairs and maintenance of his motorcycle. He's hoping that his requested loan will be granted so that he can improve his business and continue to earn an income.

loans.use: To pay for the repairs and maintenance of his motorcycle.

loans.name: Helen

texts.en:
Helen is 45 years old, married, and a resident of Dapaon, Zamboanga del Norte. She earns a living through a sari-sari store. 

She has been a member of PMPC for 7 years and enjoys the privileges of being a member of the Cooperative. Now, she is applying for a loan of Php 50,000.00 to purchase stocks for her sari-sari store.

Helen deeply wishes to remain a member in good standing with PMPC.

loans.use: to purchase stocks for her sari-sari store

loans.name: Geneza

texts.en:
Geneza is 45 years old, widowed with three children and a resident of Lumabayao, Aloran, Misamis Occidental, Philippines. She has a small sari-sari store business to sustain her family's needs. Because of the store, she has two children who have been able to finish schooling.

She has been a member of PMPC for three years and enjoys the privileges of being a member of the Cooperative. Now, she is applying for a loan of Php 6,000.00 to purchase stocks for her sari-sari store business.

Geneza deeply wishes to remain a member in good standing with PMPC.

loans.use: to purchase stocks for her sari-sari store

loans.name: Orn

texts.en:
Orn is originally from the village of Kampong Thom, married, and is a loving father of three children. He is 54 years of age. He works as a carpenter, dedicated to making and selling wooden beds while his wife helps share the living costs by contributing her income from selling rattan products. Orn started his business 20 years ago, and little by little, he has gained valuable experience and has made his business more successful.

Besides the hardships of living, Orn has turned to focus on improving sanitation practices for the entire household. Due to insufficient capital, he is asking for a loan to be used to build a hygienic latrine for the sake of his family members. Thanks to the water loan program with a special rate offered by Hattha Kaksekar Limited (HKL), Orn is encouraged to focus on ensuring healthy living conditions, to safeguard the health of his family and to protect the environment.

loans.use: to build a hygienic latrine for the sake of his family members.

loans.name: Tariq Javed

texts.en:
Tariq Javed is 32 years old and the father of one child living in Rawalpindi, Pakistan. He has been running a general store where he sells perfumes, facials, detergent, soaps, cosmetics, bangles, shampoos, etc. He manages his household necessities with his own store as well and some of his relatives like to purchase from his store. He speaks with a monotonous tone, which is impressive and he easily wins the trust of others. Due to his behavior and tone, he has built very good relations with his customers. His general store is very famous in the town and that is the reason his business is running well. Due to his good relations, his sales have increased a lot but he does not have sufficient stock to cope with the demands. Therefore, he requested a loan so that he can buy more perfumes, facials, detergent, soaps, cosmetics, bangles and shampoos. He hopes that the lenders will support him in his noble work.

Tariq Javed is very thankful to Kiva and field partner BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to buy perfumes, facials, detergent, soaps, cosmetics, bangles, and shampoos to sell

loans.name: Srey Mom

texts.en: Srey Mom is 32 years old, a married woman of three children in Kampong Chhnang Province. For survival, she works as a laborer at the garment factory and her husband works as a construction laborer. Both of them can earn $7.50 per day. Now she would like to apply for a loan of $800 to buy timber, fibro and building pillars. This loan helps her to renovate her house.  She also has plans to buy a sewing machine for providing sewing services to make more profit in order to improve her family’s standard of living.

loans.use: to buy timber, fibro and building pillars to renovate her house

loans.name: Ayaba H. Mélanie's Group

texts.fr: Ce groupe est constitué de trois personnes qui résident dans le même quartier. La représentante du groupe nommée Ayaba H. Mélanie (celle qui a la main est levée sur la photo) âgée de 51 ans, n’a pas fréquenté l’école. Ayaba H. Mélanie est veuve avec cinq enfants, dont certains scolarisés et deux à sa charge. Ayaba H. Mélanie vit seule avec ses enfants. Les différentes charges de la maison sont assumées par Ayaba H. Mélanie.  C’est pour cette raison, Ayaba H. Mélanie vend depuis vingt ans des condiments à son domicile. Ayaba H. Mélanie s’approvisionne dans un marché du Bénin. C’est la première fois que Ayaba H. Mélanie et les membres de son groupe sollicite l’appui financier de ALIDé, dans le but de renforcer le niveau de leur activité afin de mieux répondre à la demande de sa clientèle.
texts.en: This group is composed of three persons living in the same neighborhood. The representative of the group, named Ayaba H. Mélanie (seen in the photo with her hand raised) is 51 years old, and never attended school. She is a widow and the mother of five children, several of whom attend school, and two are still under her care. Ayaba H. Mélanie lives alone with her children, and takes care of all expenses. For this reason, she has been selling condiments for the past 20 years. She stocks up on products at the market in Benin, and sells them from her home. This is the first loan that Ayaba H. Mélanie and the other members of the group are asking for financial support from ALIDE, in order to reinforce their activity level and better respond to client requests.

loans.use: purchase condiments

loans.name: Savin

texts.en: Savin is 47 years old, a widowed woman of three children in Oudong, Kampong Speu Province. She runs a small business as a retailer at home and her eldest child is a garment factory laborer. Both of them can earn $11 per day. Now she would like to apply for loan of $500 to buy more products to expand her business. This loan will help her in expending her business. She hopes that she can build a house for her family next year.

loans.use: to buy more products to expand her business

loans.name: Em

texts.en:
Em is 43 years old, married and the mother of three children living with her family in a peaceful village in Baray, Kampong Thom province. Em and her husband make a living by making and selling wooden beds and rattan products. From her current business, she is able to make a good income, which is usually spent on their food expenses, home bills and other commodities. She has been in this occupation for 20 years.

Besides the hardships she faces in her business and life, Em has turned to focus on improving sanitation practices for the entire household. Due to insufficient capital, she is asking for a loan to build a hygienic latrine for the sake of her family members. Thanks to the water loan program with a special rate offered by Hattha Kaksekar Limited (HKL), Em is encouraged to focus on ensuring healthy living conditions, to safeguard the health of her family and to protect the environment.

loans.use: to build a hygienic latrine

loans.name: Sopheap

texts.en:
Sopheap (in photo), age 34, is a tailor. She has been married since 2004, and has two sons; one attends school and another one is still young. Her husband is a mechanic for garment factory. The family is living in the suburb of Phnom Penh.
 
Sopheap operates her tailoring business from home. She wants to buy additional fabrics to better support her client’s demands. That’s why she applied for a loan in order to make the purchases.

loans.use: to buy additional fabrics for her tailoring business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase materials in order to enlarge her bakery shop.

loans.name: Saly

texts.en: Saly is 30 years old, a married woman of two children in Oudong, Kampong Speu Province. For survival, she works at the factory and her husband works as a laborer at a chicken farm. Both of them can earn $9 per day. Now she would like to apply for loan of $1300 to buy a motorbike for traveling. This loan can help her in reducing her traveling expense as she can use her own motorbike. In the future, she wants to build a house for her family and she hopes that her kids can get a diploma.

loans.use: to buy a motorbike for traveling

loans.name: Pesei

texts.en:
Pesei, age 19, is a garment factory worker. She is single and living with her grandmother in a suburb of Phnom Penh. Her grandmother sells groceries from home. 

Pesei is in the process of building a new house, but she lacks the money to finish it. She applied for a loan to finish her home. 

Photo: Pesei is in front of her grandmother’s grocery store.

loans.use: to finish building her house.

loans.name: Nelia

texts.en:
Nelia is thankful for the financial assistance extended to her. She was able to buy more frozen and processed foods for her business. She has had this business for 4 years now. Her income from the business is helping cover their everyday household expenditures. She and her husband are working hard to provide for their everyday needs.
 
Nelia would like to apply for a 30,000 Philippine peso loan to buy more processed and frozen foods needed to expand her inventory. The more items displayed at the store the better. More items to sell will result in better profit. Her profits from the business will definitely help her to meet her family's daily needs. She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart.

Nelia dreams of being more successful in business and hopes that her children will have a good future. She meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of their work every week and draws strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All Center for Community Transformation Credit Cooperative (CCT) community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet weekly. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners who gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay their microfinance loans.

loans.use: To pay for processed and frozen foods needed to expand her inventory.

loans.name: Emerita

texts.en:
Emerita joined Paglaum Multi-Purpose Cooperative in the year 2013, and she appreciates the programs, services, and continuous education of the co-op. She is a member in good standing and very active in attending the various programs and services that the Cooperative offers.
She is requesting a loan in the amount of PHP 12,000. This loan is intended to purchase additional dresses, shoes, and bags to distribute these to other stores.
Emerita dreams of nothing more than to have a happy, healthy life and an adequate income out of her  business.

loans.use: to purchase additional dresses, shoes, and bags.

loans.name: Theang

texts.en:
Theang is 27 years old and married with two children who are under-aged for schooling. Theang is a resident from Chong Doung commune, Baray, Kampong Thom, where local people operate farming businesses as their main sources of income. Theang has been cultivating rice for years, and is engaged in making and selling rattan products to supplement her income.

Theang would like to focus on improving the sanitation practices for her entire household, but she has inadequate capital. That’s why she is asking for a loan to build a hygienic latrine for the sake of her family members.

Thanks to the water loan program with a special rate offered by Hattha Kaksekar Limited (HKL), Theang is encouraged to focus on ensuring healthy living conditions, to safeguard the health of her family and protect the environment.

loans.use: to build a hygienic latrine for her family.

loans.name: Nelfa

texts.en:
Nelfa is 64 years old and presently residing in Catadman, Ozamis city. She is married with two adult children. Nelfa owns a sari-sari store, which sells a variety of goods and products. 

Nelfa is requesting a loan amount of PHP 20,000 as additional capital to buy products and goods to resell in her existing business. Nelfa hopes to improve and save for her future.

loans.use: to buy products and goods to resell .

loans.name: Waheed Akhter

texts.en:
Waheed Akhter is a 38-year-old man, residing in Rawalpindi, Pakistan. He is a father of one child. He has been running a crockery store for 10 years, and he is only responsible to feed the entire family. He is applying for a Kiva loan from its field partner BRAC Pakistan because he has to purchase different types of crockery i.e. jugs, glasses, plates, dinner sets, and spoon sets etc. This loan will help him to purchase these items for reselling purposes so that he can earn maximum profit and increase the daily sales. He is the sole earner of the family and fulfils all type of financial requirements from his crockery shop earning. His household necessities increase day-by-day. so he decided to increase his business. In this way he would be able to meet his requirements.
He speaks with a monotonous tone which is impressive, and he easily wins the trust of others. Due to his behaviour and tone, he has built up very good relationships with his customers as well. His crockery shop is very famous in the town which is the reason his business running well. Due to good relationships, his sales have also increased a lot, but he does not have enough capital to invest because he has to spend a large part of his savings on household expenses. Therefore, Waheed Akhter requested a loan from Kiva’s field partner BRAC Pakistan; he hopes that the lenders would support him for his noble work.

loans.use: to buy new crockery stock such as dinner sets, spoon sets, plastic utensils, etc. for resale.

loans.name: Channa

texts.en:
This is Channa. He is married, 30 years of age, and has four dependent children. He is a resident and is a very hardworking person from a rural commune in Siem Reap province. From early morning each day, he goes to work in his fields taking care of his rice crop to ensure a good harvest. He also sells chopped wood to supplement his income. He is photographed with his wife in this photo.

As this is his first loan, Channa aims to invest in the purchase of a home solar system to install on the top roof of his house, which is located in the off-grid area of the province. After this initial investment, Channa will be able to gain access to clean energy, which he will use to support household appliances such as lights, TV and radio, so everyone in his family can work or study at night. He is very thankful, and is hoping that his requested loan will be granted, so that he can improve his living conditions.

loans.use: to invest in the purchase of a home solar system.

loans.name: Estrella

texts.en: Estrella is 57 years of age with a one adult child and presently resides at Bongabong Street, Catadman, Ozamis City. Estrella has an existing sari-sari store and she is requesting a 10,000 PHP loan to buy stock for her business like soap, noodles, rice and candies. Estrella hopes to save for her future.

loans.use: to buy stock for her sari-sari store like soap, noodles, rice and candies

loans.name: Patras Masih

texts.en:
Patras Masih is a very hard-working and active borrower with Kiva's partner BRAC Pakistan. He is thirty-five years old and lives in Rawalpindi with his family: a decent and responsible housewife and three children.
